review: It was very nice consulting Dr Sanyam. He gave proper time and explained everything about possible options for my treatment. I recommend people to visit his clinic if they have any orthopaedic problem.
Awesome experience at clinic. Doctor listens to the problem very carefully and is very experiencd. I was treated for back pain and the result  was very good. Will recommend Dr. Sanyam to everyone

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a opd case but they admitted urgently at 10:30 am in morning and done lots of test, x-ray, MRI ***** *** *** ********* After admitted in room, no doctor came to check the reason for severe back pain till 7 in evening despite patient was unable to sit or stand or to move. In evening he came to tell for physiotherapy for some days.

Next day we decided to leave and take physiotherapy at home knowing the huge amount of bill

Wouldn't recommend this hospital at all ** **** *** **** **** ** ****** *** ******* ** ****** **** ****
